text:
@ArvindKejriwal Pls release a order for all hospital in delhi.. who don't attend patients.. they said 'PHLE COVID-19 KA TEST KRWAO FR AAO'

Aise kaise chlega.. kya unke pass nhi hai test krne ke liye Equipments..

Itne me patient mar jaega..

Lots of video viral for the same matter..
